body.name: Jeep PowerGlyde Plus Stroller by Delta Children - Lightweight Travel Stroller with Smoothest Ride, Aluminum Frame, 4-Position Recline, Extra Large Storage Basket, Grey

features: SMOOTHEST RIDE: Swivel front wheels feature precision technology for outstanding control and effortless push, it’s easier than ever to glide, turn and maneuver any surface | Locking back brakes | Puncture-proof 6-inch tires are durable and shock absorbing
LIGHTWEIGHT: The ultimate in convenience, this lightweight stroller has a durable aluminum frame that only weighs 13.7 lbs. | Comfortable 43" stroller height is ideal for all parents
COMPACT FOLD: The easy compact umbrella fold with carry handle and auto latch lock Is ideal for travel or everyday use | Folded dimensions: 10"L x 8"W x 46"H | Meets theme park size requirements

DESIGNED FOR COMFORT: Keep your child comfortable with optimal support in all 4 recline positions | Oversized canopy with extendable sun visor has UPF 50+ protection | Stroller has plenty of storage with its extra-large storage basket and cup holder

SAFEST OPTION: JPMA certified; Meets or exceeds and ASTM and CPSC standards | 5-point safety harness | Reflective shoulder pads | Recommended for ages 6 months up to 50 lbs. | Assembled dimensions: 31.9L x 19.3W x 43.2H
body.description: Wherever the road takes you, the Jeep powerglyde plus stroller by Delta Children will deliver the best ride ever. The Jeep powerglyde plus offers the most advanced handling thanks to all-new front wheels that feature precision technology, making it easier than ever to glide, turn and maneuver any surface. Ideal for travel or everyday use, This extremely lightweight stroller with an aluminum frame weighs under 14 pounds and features a compact umbrella fold with an auto lock design and carry handle. An extra-large extendable canopy with UPF 50+ sun visor will protect your child from the elements and a four-position reclining seat ensures baby is comfortable during walks, near and far. Some additional features of this lightweight stroller include: five-point safety harness, extra-large storage basket, cup holder and swivel front wheels. This stroller is recommended for infants 6 months up to 50 pounds. Let's glyde! Since 1941, the Jeep brand has been a symbol of freedom and expression. Influenced by a love of the great outdoors, Jeep kids' Products are created for little adventurers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Jeep Adjustable Baby and Pet Safety Gate Deluxe Wrangler Stroller Wagon with Cooler Bag and Parent Organizer Easily child proof your home with the Jeep Adjustable Baby Safety Gate by Delta Children. The Jeep Deluxe Wrangler Stroller Wagon with Cooler Bag and Parent Organizer by Delta Children is ready to tackle any family adventure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, easy, and durable
reviews.reviewText: We got this for a trip we took on a cruise and let me tell you how easy this was for airport travel. It’s light, collapses easily, and has strong sturdy straps. I just wish the lower straps were easier to adjust but other than that, it’s perfect. If you’re looking for a price friendly and sturdy stroller, this is what I recommend. I saw 10 other parents with this exact stroller on the cruise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for on the go
reviews.reviewText: Great for shopping, indoor strolls, and in parking lots! We had only ever had a jogging stroller, and I was so tired of lugging that huge heavy thing around and splurged on this stroller. It’s lightweight, fits in my car great and my baby loves it! Would recommend!! I wish the diaper bag storage compartment was bigger, but maybe it’s because I also overpack and have a ginormous diaper bag 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First and foremost the stroller says 6m but if you were curious how it would do for a strong 4m read on! We wanted a compact stroller for in stores and travel. My sister has a jeep umbrella stroller and I knew they liked theirs. I was excited when I saw they have a reclining option because my baby is 4 months old. The product clearly said 6 months but I felt comfortable having our baby try it based his size and head control. He was so cozy and happy. Wouldn’t want to go younger or smaller as they would slip/scrunch down. We were outside in winter weather so fair amount of layers and I was impressed how well the harness can be adjusted and kept them secure in slippery fabric. Definitely not a lay flat stroller but the slight recline is why we could start using it early. Very impressed by the steering and storage. We have a very Thule jogging stroller and while it definitely won’t replace - I told my husband “if someone was really tight on money and size - I would just get this because it’s so versatile!” Husband said now that we have a Jeep we need to get a rubber ducky for it.Goes without saying - instructions say 6month old so be safe and do short tests to see if it’s safe for your infant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We recently took this to Disney and it was a great option for our 3 yr old! Folded easy when needed and light weight. Cautious with putting too much on the top cuz it will fall over if child gets up quick and there’s a lot of weight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value, nice and handles are tall too. Very well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this stroller - highly recommend.
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with my purchase. I have had the 3D Lite umbrella stroller, and for me personally, the Jeep Powerglyde is much better. My daughter has also enjoyed riding comfortably in this stroller. It was easy to assemble. I only had to attach the wheels. The basket is large and easy to access. The handles are also taller than the handles of other umbrella strollers I’ve used which is also a huge plus for me. It rolls smoothly and the canopy is a nice size. I live in Florida and I wear sandals a lot, so another thing that I personally like about this stroller is that the breaks are easy to flip without hurting my feet (sounds weird, but if you know, you know lol). It collapses easily, however IF there were one thing I’d change about this stroller it would be to add a better latch when closed. However that hasn’t bothered me that much. Overall I Love this stroller. I have used several different umbrella stroller (mom of 3) and this is by far my favorite. I have recommend this stroller to family and friends.Side note: I added a universal stroller organizer to mine and it has made it even better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not sturdy enough
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this stroller for a two year old because it looked sturdy, but it below average in that area. The shoulder straps fall off, the wheels are too close to little feet and the mechanism for the shade hood is very flimsy. I’m less than impressed overall.
